SEO_TITLE: Express Döner - Authentic Döner Experience in Dortmund Scharnhorst
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy fresh and traditional Döner dishes at Express Döner in Dortmund Scharnhorst. Perfect for a family meal or a quick and delicious bite on the go.
WHATSAPP_MESSAGE: Hi, need to reserve a table or order food? Message me...
STATUS_MESSAGE: Typically replies within a few minutes, Mo-Su 10am-10pm

COOKIE_CONSENT.MESSAGE: This website uses cookies to improve user experience.
COOKIE_CONSENT.MORE_INFO: For more information, please read our cookie policy.

HERO.TITLE: Express Döner
HERO.SUBTITLE: The Taste of Tradition in Scharnhorst Dortmund
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Visit us and experience the authentic flavors of our Döner specialties.

ABOUT.INTRO: With over 5 years of experience, Express Döner offers the finest döner specialties in Dortmund, Scharnhorst.
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Located in a Small Town
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Made from fresh and high-quality ingredients.
ABOUT.ADDITIONAL_TEXT1: At Express Döner, we pride ourselves on providing our customers with only the freshest and finest ingredients. Our goal is to offer you an unforgettable culinary experience.
ABOUT.ADDITIONAL_TEXT2: Our team consists of experienced chefs who are passionate about preparing authentic döner dishes. Visit us and experience the difference.

FOUNDER.NAME: Mehmet Emin Kocak
FOUNDER.DESCRIPTION: Mehmet founded Express Döner with a vision to offer high-quality, fresh ingredients directly from Dortmund. His passion for good food and excellent service has made Express Döner what it is today.

FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Discover what makes Express Döner unique.

CARDS.TITLE: Best Quality
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: We only use the freshest ingredients for our dishes.

CARDS.TITLE: Fast Service
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy fast and friendly service with every visit.

CARDS.TITLE: Comfortable Ambience
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Our restaurant offers a cozy and inviting atmosphere for all our guests.

BOOKING.DESCRIPTION: Reserve your table easily and conveniently online.
BOOKING.FRESH_INGREDIENTS: Enjoy meals made from fresh and premium ingredients.

REVIEWS.DESCRIPTION: Hear what our customers have to say about us.

REVIEWS_LIST.NAME: Anna Schmidt
REVIEWS_LIST.COMMENT: I love the fresh ingredients and the attentive service at Express Döner. A must-visit for anyone in Dortmund!

REVIEWS_LIST.NAME: Tomasz Kowalski
REVIEWS_LIST.COMMENT: The best Döner I've found outside of Poland. Great for a quick and tasty snack.

REVIEWS_LIST.NAME: Emel Aktas
REVIEWS_LIST.COMMENT: We feel at home here. The Döner are perfectly seasoned and remind us of Turkey.

SHOWCASE.DESCRIPTION: Explore our diverse and delicious offerings.

PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Ingredients: Flatbread, döner meat, salad, tomatoes, onions, sauce

PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Perfectly cooked meat from the rotisserie

PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Ingredients: Tortilla, fresh vegetables, salad, sauce

PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Ingredients: Salad, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, feta

PRODUCTS.NAME: Chicken with Fries
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: Ingredients: Grilled chicken, fries, lemon, parsley

MEMBERS.NAME: Mehmet Emin
MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: Mehmet is known for her innovative recipes and passion for local ingredients.

VIDEO.TITLE: Discover Express Döner
VIDEO.DESCRIPTION: Experience the authentic taste of Express Döner.
VIDEO.SUBTITLE: Quality and Authenticity
VIDEO.INTRO: Watch our chefs create the best Döner in Dortmund.

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Express Döner stands for quality and excellent service in Dortmund. Visit us at Gleiwitzstraße 269A, 44328 Dortmund.
